greeting: What can Kilo Code do for you?

task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

about:
Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance.
Check out our documentation to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Boomerang Tasks
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Kilo Code wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Kilo Code wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Kilo Code wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Kilo Code wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Kilo Code wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Kilo Code performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Kilo Code wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Kilo Code wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Kilo Code wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Kilo Code wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Kilo Code viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Kilo Code wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Kilo Code recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Kilo Code wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Kilo Code viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Kilo Code wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.didSearch: Kilo Code searched this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Kilo Code wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Kilo Code wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Kilo Code wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Kilo Code wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}
modes.didSwitchWithReason: Kilo Code switched to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Kilo Code wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Kilo Code wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Kilo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ Roo Code 3.16 Released
announcement.description: Roo Code 3.16 brings new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Groq and Chutes API Providers</bold>: Added support for Groq and Chutes API providers (thanks @shariqriazz!)
announcement.feature2: <bold>Clickable Code References</bold>: Code references in model responses now navigate to source lines (thanks @KJ7LNW!)
announcement.feature3: <bold>MCP Stability Improvements</bold>: Fixed several bugs to enhance the stability of MCP integrations
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> ðŸš€

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Roo Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.
